name: winnable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a competition, election, fight, etc. is winnable, it is possible to win it: The game next week looks eminently winnable. There is a drive to get more women candidates selected in safe and winnable seats. It was obvious to most people that this was not a winnable war. His lawyers were not sure that he had a winnable case.
More examplesFewer examplesThis was another case of a winnable game not being won.Democratic party officials in Virginia said they believed that their state was winnable.We need to look at the winnable races, the tough battles that will determine control of the House and the Senate.
